title: Award 10 rupee signup bonus to new users on first login

requirements.text: Modify the backend user registration logic to automatically credit 10 rupees to a user's account balance when they register for the first time during login

quotes: Now user ko fast login me 10 rupe uske account me dena hoga

acceptanceCriteria: New users receive exactly 10 rupees credited to their account upon first registration
The 10 rupee bonus is only awarded once per user on their initial signup
Existing users who already have accounts do not receive the bonus
The bonus amount is added to the user's earnings balance immediately

requirements.text: Create a transaction record in the transaction history showing the 10 rupee signup bonus when a new user registers

quotes: Now user ko fast login me 10 rupe uske account me dena hoga

acceptanceCriteria: A transaction entry is created with task description indicating it is a signup bonus
The transaction shows 10 rupees as the earned amount
The transaction timestamp reflects when the user first registered
The signup bonus transaction appears in the user's transaction history

constraints: Only award the 10 rupee bonus to genuinely new users, not existing users
Maintain the existing user registration flow and authentication system
Do not modify the Internet Identity authentication mechanism
nonGoals: Modifying the currency system or changing rupees to another currency
Adding recurring bonuses or daily login rewards
Implementing referral bonuses or other promotional rewards
Changing the amount of the signup bonus based on user actions
